channel.title: Inheritance in Java :: Java Web Development
channel.description: Letâ€™s examine an inheritance relationship between two classes, Cat and HouseCat. HouseCat is a class that inherits from Cat. When defined, HouseCat thus receives the data and behaviors of Cat. These inherited traits are things like fields, properties, and methods. Any fields and non-constructor methods in Cat are available to each instance of HouseCat. When we speak about an inheritance relationship, we say that a HouseCat is a Cat, or extends Cat.
